articles.original_title: Russia threatens Europe's cybersecurity - Prime Minister makes strategic decision
articles.optimized_title: Russia threatens Europe's cybersecurity - Prime Minister makes strategic decision
articles.description: Prime Minister Donald Tusk met with Estonian Prime Minister Kristen Michal in Warsaw. The talks focused on the security of Poland and Estonia, assistance to Ukraine, and cooperation in the region and within NATO. The politicians paid special attention to the need to ensure cybersecurity in Europe. That is why Donald Tusk decided that TVN and Polsat television stations will be placed on the list of strategic companies that are subject to special protection, e.g. against aggressive takeovers.

articles.original_title: Meeting of Deputy Minister Paweł Zalewski with French parliamentarians
articles.optimized_title: Meeting of Deputy Minister Paweł Zalewski with French parliamentarians
articles.description: On December 11, 2024, a meeting was held between the Secretary of State at the Ministry of National Defense, Paweł Zalewski, and the deputies of the National Defense and Armed Forces Committee of the National Assembly of the French Republic, represented by: Ms. Sabine Thillaye, Vice-Chairwoman of the National Defense and Armed Forces Committee, and Mr. Francois Cormier-Bouligeo and Mr. Emmanuel Fernandes, members of the Committee.

articles.original_title: Meeting of Deputy Minister Paweł Bejda with the Ambassador of Uzbekistan
articles.optimized_title: Meeting of Deputy Minister Paweł Bejda with the Ambassador of Uzbekistan
articles.description: On December 11, Deputy Minister Paweł Bejda met with the Ambassador of the Republic of Uzbekistan, Mr. Amirasaid Agzamkhodajev, at the Ministry of National Defense. The talks focused on issues related to military-technical cooperation between Poland and Uzbekistan.

articles.original_title: A dangerous scenario for Poland has emerged. We have less and less time
articles.optimized_title: A dangerous scenario for Poland has emerged. We have less and less time
articles.description: The Kremlin declares victory in the war with Ukraine. Zelensky - when asked where Russia will go in the negotiations - replies that it would be best to go to hell, but he is willing to give up the occupied territories in exchange for NATO guarantees. Paris, London and Germany are ready to send troops to Ukraine. Is this the last year of the war?
